Newton.House at 41 Middlesex Road: The House at 41 Middlesex Road in the Chestnut Hill section of Newton, Massachusetts is a well-preserved local example of Shingle style architecture. The ​2 1⁄2-story stone-and-wood house was built in 1894 by William R. Dupee, who lived on a nearby estate.
